entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Rodney
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:59 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ridgetown 4:00 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Temperature: 3.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 2.9°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of drizzle. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of drizzle changing to 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late in the evening then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. High zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
